attributes.action: Give Student Nurses a Realistic Bursary Payment During Their 3 Year University Education.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Student Nurses have the biggest workload of any of the UK's Higher Education Students, with full time University Tuition and then 8-10 Week Clinical Placements working on Hospital Wards with the same rota's as Qualified Staff Nurses. 
Therefore, Student Nurses do not have the time to work a part time job to supplement their meager NHS Bursary Payment of circa £5800 p.a however many are forced to, and therefore their studies ultimately suffer.
An increase to approx £10000 p.a. would be reasonable in proportion to the workload that nursing students have.
